title: Is Kled releasing today or next week?
body:
I really hope it's today as I wanna play him.

Knowing my lucking it'll be in two weeks when I don't wanna play him anymore.

replies.body: Don't think the update was a patch update, was only like 4mb

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=agT0hT7w,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-03T02:50:44.623+0000)
>
> Don't think the update was a patch update, was only like 4mb

triggered.

So next week with a 4 day wait until he's activated.

Hey Annie Bots Wife, 

It won't be until at least patch day which appears to be next week. 

Regardless of if Kled has any bugs, Riot won't release contact until at least 24 hours after the patch goes live. This is something they learnt awhile ago, as their was a lot of server instability. This is usually 48 hours to ensure stability. 

He definitely won't be released today. Sorry about that.

> [{quoted}](name=Annie Bots Wife,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=agT0hT7w,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-03T02:53:24.012+0000)
>
> triggered.
> 
> So next week with a 4 day wait until he's activated.

We might get lucky, I haven't seen or heard of any bugs with him on pbe so if all goes well he should be released on patch day
